overview: Ksenia lives in a small town and works as a secretary in a criminal court. She loves to travel and dreams of moving, but she can't get away from her grandmother, who is getting more and more immersed in the world of dreams and visions every day. An unloved job, a failed romance, pills, depression and trains that pass by every time - all this is about spring, which comes regardless of our mood and problems.
title: Spring
